page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT
page.content: IN 1985 AS IN MANY PLACES IN THE COUNTRY,THERE IS AN EMPLOYMENT PROBLEM ICI IS GRADUALLY CLOSING DOWN PARTS OF ITS FACTORIES IN NORTHWICH AND THIS MEANS THAT OTHER INDUSTRIES AND SERVICES WHICH RELY ON ICI ARE CLOSING DOWN AS WELL. ICI HAS BEEN THE MAJOR EMPLOYER IN NORTHWICH FOR MANY DECADES AND THIS HAS MEANT THAT THERE HAS BEEN SECURITY OF EMPLOYMENT FOR THEIR WORKERS. AT PRESENT THERE ARE FEWER JOBS AVAILABLE AND THESE JOBS OFTEN INVOLVE TRAVEL. AS ICI HAS MOVED TO MORE ECONOMIC AREAS SO THEIR WORKERS HAVE BEEN OFFERED JOBS IN THE NEW AREAS.THIS HAS MEANT EITHER MOVING OR TRAVELING. IN OUR SURVEY OF ICI WORKERS 63 PER CENT WERE HAPPY WITH THEIR WAGES AND 25 PER CENT WOULD TRAVEL TO OTHER AREAS RATHER THAN MOVE TO THAT AREA.
